initialScreen.welcomeFmt: TODO SV DjVu.js Viewer v. %(viewerVersion)s welcomes you!
initialScreen.youCanOpenLinks: TODO SV Now you can open links to .djvu files automatically (with a click) when the corresponding option is enabled.
initialScreen.tryToClickLinkFmt: TODO SV Just try to click the link "%(linkToSampleDjvuFile)s" with the option enabled and disabled to understand what it is about.
initialScreen.chromeExtensionFmt: TODO SV The Google Chrome's version of the extension allows to open local files by a browser directly (via a double-click). But you have to enable the %(allowAccessToFileUrls)s option on the extension's options page. Otherwise, the feature won't work.
initialScreen.Allow access to file URLs: TODO SV Allow access to file URLs
initialScreen.clickHelpButtonFmt: TODO SV Click the %(helpButton)s button to learn more about the application.
